Section.Catchline: Use of Insurance Regulatory Trust Fund.

SectionBody.Text: The funds received from the Insurance Regulatory Trust Fund shall be used by the staff of the Florida State Fire College to provide all necessary services, training, equipment, and supplies to carry out the college’s responsibilities, including, but not limited to, the State Fire Marshal Scholarship Grant Program and the procurement of training films, videotapes, audiovisual equipment, and other useful information on fire, firefighting, and fire prevention, including public fire service information packages.
